title: El Cid Golf & Country Club In Mazatlan Announces Year-Round Wright Balance Golf Academy
text:
El Cid Golf & Country Club
MAZATLAN, Mexico , Oct. 6, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Wright Balance Golf Academy, announced that it is expanding to a year-round golf instruction and practice facility at El Cid Golf & Country Club in Mazatlán, Mexico. Designed and trained by Dr. David Wright , a GOLF Magazine Top 100 Instructor, the Academy features his coaching techniques and tailor-made programs.
The Wright Balance Golf Academy provides an instructional environment focused on maximizing each student's learning experience. Featuring one-of-a-kind balance measurement and balance fitting systems, its programs are designed for beginner to professional levels. Dr. Wright and his instructors train using techniques designed to minimize physical stress and maximize the use of core muscles. The Academy also aims to increase core balance, provide course management coaching, and improve short game performance.
Dr. David Wright has been a professional golf instructor since 1982. He has been described by top golf publications as the "Balance Expert." Before opening the Academy, Dr. Wright held coaching posts at the University of Southern California men's and women's golf teams from 1999 through 2008. During his tenure the teams won various championships, including team and individual NCAA National Championships, and multiple Regional NCAA and PAC 10 Conference Championships.
"We're proud to offer our guests the highest standard of golf instruction," said Carlos Berdegue Sacristan, CEO and President of El Cid Group. "By offering classes and packages year-round, guests are never limited – they can develop and improve their golfing skills while relaxing in the beach destination of Mazatlán any time of the year."
The El Cid Golf & Country Club features world-class golfing, with three premier golf courses, each with its own signature character and nine holes designed by Lee Trevino . The Wright Balance Golf Academy at the El Cid Golf & Country Club offers a variety of packages and golf session itineraries, from half-day to three-day workshops. Golf School dates are available year round, with monthly classes beginning now through October 2016 . For more information about El Cid's Wright Balance Golf Academy, or to make a reservation, please visit: www.elcidgolfacademy.com .
